weheartpy.WeHeartIt¶

class weheartpy.WeHeartIt¶

the WeHeartIt class.

eg. instantiating the class: `` whi = WeHeartIt() popular_posts = whi.popular() ``

__init__() → None¶

Methods

__init__()

popular()

return a list of Entry objects of the popular images.

search_collections(query)

return a list of Collection objects resulting from the query.

search_entries(query[, sort])

returns a list of Entry objects according to your search query.

search_users(query)

returns a list of ``User``s according to search query.
